name: volt-tackle
flavor_text: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
effect_text_simple: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
